Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. 这是一个测试。 \(a^2+b^2=c^2\) 球体体积公式 \(\dfrac{4}{3}\pi r^3\) 实数、比例、绝对值 ceshiceshi \(\dfrac{a+b}{a+c} \geqslant a+b\)
